sxchan 0.1.0
  • Reference

Demonstration Bankline Polygon Object

demo_bankline.Rd

Bankline polygon of a segment of a hypothetical stream.

Usage

demo_bankline

Format

A polygon sfc object with coordinate reference system 3005 (BC Albers projection).

Source

The demo bankline polygon was generated using the following code, using sf version 1.0.16 and R version 4.3.3.

demo_bankline <- sf::st_as_sf(tibble::tribble(
  ~x, ~y,
  656873.7, 5553711,
  656993.1, 5553738,
  656993.6, 5553738,
  656994.1, 5553738,
  656994.6, 5553738,
  656995.1, 5553738,
  656995.7, 5553738,
  656996.2, 5553738,
  656996.7, 5553738,
  656997.2, 5553738,
  656997.7, 5553738,
  656998.2, 5553738,
  656998.7, 5553738,
  656999.2, 5553738,
  656999.7, 5553737,
  657000.2, 5553737,
  657000.6, 5553737,
  657001.0, 5553737,
  657001.5, 5553736,
  657001.9, 5553736,
  657002.3, 5553736,
  657002.6, 5553735,
  657003.0, 5553735,
  657003.3, 5553734,
  657003.6, 5553734,
  657126.8, 5553550,
  657127.0, 5553550,
  657127.3, 5553549,
  657127.5, 5553549,
  657127.7, 5553548,
  657127.9, 5553548,
  657128.1, 5553548,
  657128.2, 5553547,

  657129.8, 5553466,

  657126.7, 5553458,

  656995.2, 5553355,

  coords = c("x", "y")) |>
  sf::st_combine() |>
  sf::st_cast("LINESTRING") |>
  sf::st_buffer(100)
sf::st_crs(demo_bankline) <- 3005
